56.eng-name: Fighting for the Cause of Allah (Jihaad)

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira: The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "Let the slave of Dinar and Dirham, and of Qatifah and Khamisa (i.e. money and luxurious clothes) perish for he is pleased if these things are given to him, and if not, he is displeased

chapter.ara-name: باب الْحِرَاسَةِ فِي الْغَزْوِ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ
chapter.eng-name: Vigilance during holy battles in Allah's Cause
